alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; East Cameron; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 7:38AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cameron, northwestern Jefferson Davis, Beauregard, Calcasieu, western Allen Parishes in southwestern Louisiana and eastern Orange Counties through 830 AM CDT... At 737 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Oretta to near Starks to near Port Arthur. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Orange, De Ridder, Bridge City, Westlake, West Orange, Vinton, Iowa, Merryville, Elizabeth, Reeves, Singer, Moss Bluff, Sugartown, Fields, Mittie, Dry Creek, Grand Lake and Deweyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 880 and 875. Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 43. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Beauregard; East Cameron; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu; West Cameron
